kateacuff.comment: I voted yes because I think there has been significant progress made on the student code of conduct over time, and we've had extensive discussions regarding the impact of cell phones, dress codes, etc.  I don't know what kind of data we're going to get out of any student survey, but at some point we have to move forward and make decisions.  So I'm supportive of moving ahead.

jonnoalcaro.comment: The motion passed with six yeses, zero nays, and one abstention.

grahampaige.comment: All right, I'm ready to vote now.
